Sentencas: A lanthanum and calcium co-doped A-site deficient strontium titanate (LSCTA-) was used as alternative anode material in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) with an active area of 100 cm(2).
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Cell performance was tested in both short (5 cell) stack configuration, as well as a full HEXIS Galileo system (nominally 1kWAC).
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Impregnation with various electrocatalysts, such as nickel and ceria, yielded promising fuel cell performance at this scale.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: The system test initially produced 70% of the nominal output power and is to the authors' knowledge the first all-oxide SOFC test on this scale.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: The strontium titanate backbone provides sufficient electronic conductivity to ensure acceptable ohmic losses.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Power densities up to 200mAcm(-2) could be obtained at 900 degrees C, which compares well with Ni-cermet based anodes.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Degradation is however severe at 900 degrees C, due to impregnate coarsening, but operation at 850 degrees C minimizes this effect.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Short stacks could be stably operated for 1,600 hours with an output power of 100mAcm(-2).
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode

Sentencas: Stacks are redox stable, but currently not sulphur tolerant.
Titulo: Short Stack and Full System Test Using aCeramic A-Site Deficient Strontium Titanate Anode
